text: Alice in Wonderland is a 2010 American fantasy adventure movie with Mia Wasikowska, Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway, Crispin Glover, Michael Sheen, Matt Lucas, Barbara Windsor, Christopher Lee, Alan Rickman, Michael Gough and Stephen Fry. A sequel of the film, Alice Through the Looking Glass, was released in 2016. It is based on the Disney film Alice in Wonderland, which is based on Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, a book written by Lewis Carroll. The score is by Danny Elfman. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2010 3D movies Category:2010 adventure movies Category:2010 fantasy movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:American family movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:Movies directed by Tim Burton Category:Disney movie remakes Category:2010s feminist movies
title: Alice in Wonderland (2010 movie)
